# Project: General Instructions of Purposebridge Limited Agents

## General Instructions:

- When generating new code, please follow the existing coding style.
- Ensure all new functions and classes have docstring comments.
- Prefer functional programming paradigms where appropriate.

## Coding Style:

- Use 4 spaces for indentation.
- implement logging from the start, any and all messages to the console(eg print) should use logging
- logging should be instantiated to use a log file, place relative to the root in logs/

## Directory Structure

- relative to the project root application and class files should be placed in app/
- relative to the project root documentation should be placed in docs/
- relative to the project root tests should be placed in test/ and prefixed test_ 


## Regarding Dependencies:

- Avoid introducing new external dependencies unless absolutely necessary.
- If a new dependency is required, please state the reason.
